mapper.select: insert into userinfo(id, pw, name, insdate, useyn) values(#{id},#{pw},#{name},SYSDATE,#{useyn})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into userinfodetail(id, userinfodetailcd, relcd, addrcd, addrname, mobiletelno, hometelno, insuser, insdate, useyn, delivname) values(#{id}, (select 'U'||substr('000000000'||to_char(max(to_number(replace(nvl(userinfodetailcd,'0'),'U',''))) + 1),-8,8) userinfodetailcd from USERINFODETAIL), #{relcd}, #{addrcd}, #{addrname}, #{mobiletelno}, #{hometelno}, '신규가입자', sysdate, #{useyn}, #{delivname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM codemng CONNECT BY PRIOR cdno = upcd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODEMNG (cdno, cdlvl, upcd, cdname, insuser, insdate, useyn) VALUES ((select 'C'||substr('00000'||to_char(max(to_number(replace(nvl(cdno,'0'),'C',''))) + 1),-4,4) cdno from codemng), #{cdlvl}, #{upcd}, #{cdname}, 'admin', #{insdate}, 'Y')
mapper.select: select itemcd, itemname, madenmcd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno=madenmcd) as madename, itemunitcd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno=itemunitcd) as itemunitname, stockamt, stockyn, insuser, insdate, useyn, itemclscd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno in (select upcd from codemng where cdno = itemclscd)) as itemclsname from itemlist

select distinct itemcd, itemname, madenmcd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno=madenmcd) as madename, itemunitcd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno=itemunitcd) as itemunitname, stockamt, stockyn, insuser, insdate, useyn, itemclscd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno in (select upcd from codemng where cdno = itemclscd)) as itemclsname from itemlist where itemcd = #{itemcd}
select distinct itemname from itemlist where (select cdname from codemng where cdno in (select upcd from codemng where cdno = itemclscd)) = #{itemcd}

select itemcd, itemname, madenmcd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno=madenmcd) as madename, itemunitcd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno=itemunitcd) as itemunitname, stockamt, stockyn, insuser, insdate, useyn, itemclscd, (select cdname from codemng where cdno in (select upcd from codemng where cdno = itemclscd)) as itemclsname from itemlist where (select cdname from codemng where cdno in (select upcd from codemng where cdno = itemclscd)) = #{producta} and itemname = #{suba}
